name.ja: <ruby>楽<rt>がっ</rt></ruby><ruby>姫<rt>き</rt></ruby>の<ruby>代<rt>だい</rt></ruby><ruby>演<rt>えん</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: Send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.

effect.en: Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if the only monsters in your Graveyard are WIND Attribute monsters, you can Special Summon 1 Warrior Type monster from your Graveyard to your field in face-up Defense Position. This turn, you can only attack with WIND Attribute Warrior Type monsters.
